segments.text: Good afternoon , sir . What can I do for you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'd like to get this prescription filled .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No problem . Please wait a minute . ( She goes to the back for a few minutes . ) Here is your medicine , sir . Take two tablets after each meal and once before bed .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thanks . Do you sell aspirin here ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , our over-the-counter medicine is over there on that shelf .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , I see it . Do you have multi-vitamins ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: ( The customer gets the aspirin and vitamins . ) That'll be $ 16.00 .
segments.speaker: S2
